sentence.Network_en: Until recently Sammy has seemed to be retaining his hard sanity.
sentence.Network_cn: 不久之前,山米看来还是能够保持清醒的头脑.

sentence.Network_en: It's only a retaining fee, you see.
sentence.Network_cn: 这只是一笔预约费啊, 知道吗.

sentence.Network_en: The more useful work a visual element can accomplish while still retaining clarity, the better.
sentence.Network_cn: 一个视觉元素越能在完成更多工作的同时表达仍然清晰, 就越好.

entry.def: To retain something means to continue to have that thing.

example.ex: The interior of the shop still retains a nineteenth-century atmosphere...
example.tran: 这家商店的内部装修仍然保留着19世纪的风格。

example.ex: He retains a deep respect for the profession...
example.tran: 他对这个职业仍然深怀敬意。

entry.def: If you retain a lawyer, you pay him or her a fee to make sure that he or she will represent you when your case comes before the court.

example.ex: He decided to retain him for the trial.
example.tran: 他决定聘请他为出庭律师。

Sentence.sentence: But inside, special windows cut power bills by blocking solar heat in summer and retaining indoor warmth in winter.
